title: Galaxy S22 Ultra vs Vivo X70 Pro Plus: Can Samsung’s epic camera system beat Vivo’s insane HDR and gimbal camera?
content:
We here at XDA usually would not bother dedicating an entire versus piece comparing a 2022 flagship that’s widely available (Samsung’s Galaxy S22 Ultra) against a 2021 flagship that’s available only in select parts of the world (Vivo’s X70 Pro Plus). But the X70 Pro Plus was no ordinary phone — it was, at least

The post Galaxy S22 Ultra vs Vivo X70 Pro Plus: Can Samsung’s epic camera system beat Vivo’s insane HDR and gimbal camera? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is the most overall capable phone in the world, but can it beat the Vivo X70 Pro Plus' cameras?
